source: # In case there are Leavers not yet in hr_employee_dim

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employee_dim_from_leavers

--     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Pers_No,
    Last_name,
    First_name,
    Loc,
    Location,
    PS_group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    Org_unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    Employee_No,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers
WHERE Pers_No NOT IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim)
## Load new lines for leavers not in hr_employee_dim
